A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Went to see it with a friend. The motivations of major characters escapes me. Kylo Ren is top of the list\, really cannot understand why he does what he does. This disjointedness carries over into basic facts of the narrative. If the Rebel Alliance is really just 400 people\, why is it significant in a galaxy of millions? I can suspend disbelief like a pro\, but this is just sloppy.
